name: UNTITLED_FOLDER Legacy Edition
description:
Untitled Folder Legacy Edition

WARNING!

Jumpscares and scary themes such as tryphobia are in this game.

This is a remake of the orginal game, Untitled, I made 6 months ago with improved graphics made in adobe animate and other software along with original music of itself.

I will still list off most of the new changes new version.

STORY

You are in your adult phase of life and are about to go to sleep. as you are sleeping you end up going through your memories and try to escape a nightmare you experienced and had as a kid. You wake up in a cold sweat and realize it isnt real.

GAMEPLAY

Same as the original version. Run Around, Collect Memories and avoid scary man.

CREDITS

Art Created By Ziman, Golden, Ocean
